citation.abstract: To estimate the absolute and relative lifetime medical costs of treating women with cardiovascular disease (CVD), diabetes, or stress urinary incontinence (SUI).
citation.title: Lifetime medical costs for women: cardiovascular disease, diabetes, and stress urinary incontinence.

blogs.title: If You're One Of The World's 382 Million Diabetics, Your Wages May Dip
blogs.summary: The caseload could surge to 592 million by 2035, with a huge contribution from the developing world. And across the globe, people with diabetes tend to earn less — or lose their job altogether.» E-Mail This

news.title: Eating More — Or Less — Of 10 Foods May Cut Risk Of Early Death
news.summary: Consuming a diet that contains high amounts of red and processed meat such as bacon was linked to 8 percent of cardiometabolic deaths in the U.S.

news.title: Eating More — Or Less — Of 10 Foods May Cut Risk Of Early Death
news.summary: About half of all U.S. deaths from heart disease, stroke and Type 2 diabetes are linked to poor diets, according to a new study published in the Journal of the American Medical Association.
